title: Capitol Reef National Park: Panoramas
body: Panoramas       These panoramic images allow viewers to scan right and left or zoom in and out. They provide a way of getting an overall impression of a scene and not just one static view. Click on the links and when the panorama opens, hold down the mouse on the image and drag to the right or left to pan around. Use the + and - buttons to zoom in and out.        Marc Martin/NPS  Strike Valley (1.50 KB)        NPS  Petroglyph Panel (1.46 KB)        Marc Martin/NPS  Chevrons at Strike Valley (1.48 KB)
